text: Katie Griffiths (born 6 April 1989) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the role of Chlo Grainger in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2006â€“2009, 2023). ==Personal life== Griffiths is from Kildwick, near Skipton, a town in North Yorkshire. In 2022, she got engaged to her partner. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Yorkshire
